confirm-forgot-password.section-callout: We’re excited to get you back on FANDOM!
confirm-forgot-password.section-text: If we have a matching username registered, you will receive an email with instructions to reset your password. You may need to check your spam folder and unblock {communityFandomEmail}.

confirm-reset-password.section-text: You can now sign in with your new password.

fb-register.facebook-registration-info: Create a FANDOM username and password that will be linked to your Facebook account.

fb-connect.facebook-connect-info: Sign in using your FANDOM account to connect with Facebook

forgot-password.section-text: Enter your username below and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.
forgot-password.title: Forgot password
forgot-password.token-expired-section-text: Please request a new one to reset your password.

register.email-already-registered: Email is already registered on FANDOM
register.cannot-complete-registration: We can not complete your registration at this time
register.terms-of-use-text: By creating an account, you agree to {termsOfUseLink}
register.wikia-newsletter-prompt: Email me about FANDOM news and events

piggyback.warning: Warning: This will run ALL custom user-account CSS and JS on your machine. Be careful!
piggyback.re-enter-credentials: Please re-enter your username and password
